Frequently Asked Question

How should I apply Platinum Eau De Toilette for maximum longevity?

For optimal performance, apply Platinum Eau De Toilette to pulse points (wrists, neck, behind ears) immediately after showering when skin is still slightly damp. This helps lock in the fragrance molecules for extended wear. Avoid rubbing wrists together as this breaks down the scent compounds. For special occasions, try the "layering technique" by applying an unscented moisturizer first, then spraying the cologne for enhanced projection and longevity. One to three sprays is typically sufficient for this concentrated formula.
